entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failure in HostActivation.Tests.MultiArchInstallLocation.EnvironmentVariable_DotnetRootPathDoesNotExist #72891
  • Rewrite 3 MemoryCache tests to not be timing sensitive #72890
  • Update ConvertToLibraryImport analyzer and fixer to limit false-positives/code breaks #72883
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Creating an empty temporary directory #72881
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][wbt] Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmBuildAppTest.TopLevelMain failed #72880
    7.0.0
  • GetAndSet_AreThreadSafe_AndUpdatesNeverLeavesNullValues failing #72879
    Future
  • All codefix providers should have `SharedAttribute` #72876
  • add support for CertificateChainPolicy to Quic #72873
    7.0.0
  • The browser-wasm SDK should support using multithread and perftrace runtime variants. #72872
    8.0.0
  • Many tests fails on the device 'tvOS 13.4 (17L255) - Apple TV on [release/6.0] branch PR #72867
  • [Android] Some System.Text.Json tests are failing on Android x86 #72862
  • Assert.Null failed for mono in System.Reflection.Emit.Tests #72858
  • [wasm-ep] Sampling thread requests resume for a thread with !(suspend_count > 0) #72857
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Are derived static members returned in `getProperties` request correctly? #72856
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64Tests #72866
  • if I use `MONO_AOT_MODE_INTERP` execute mode, the corelib must be aot #72848
  • Newbie help on debugging libraries: Looking for a working vscode+linux debug setup for libraries #72841
  • Assert failed: block != nullptr in system.xml.xmlserializer.reflectiononly.tests #72840
  • System.UnauthorizedAccessException in system.io.packaging.tests.tests.zippackage_createwithfileaccesswrite #72837
  • microsoft.extensions.logging.generators.roslyn4.0.tests work item #72836
    7.0.0
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests work item #72834
  • Better reflection type name parser for the AOT compiler #72833
    8.0.0
  • Apparent heap corruption in crossgen2 on NativeAOT Arm64 Linux #72831
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) in System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests #72830
    7.0.0
  • ARM iOS build hung during CI #72829
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.Composite packaging misauthored - currently only win-x64 packages get published #72828
  • GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails on mono #72827
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest(posixRule: \"<+00>0<+01>,A/0,J365/25\", dayNumber: 0, monthNumber: 0, shouldSucceed: False) #72825
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/AdvSimd.Arm64/AdvSimd.Arm64_Part3_r/AdvSimd.Arm64_Part3_r.sh #72824
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/fileversionpreservation/fileversionpreservation/fileversionpreservation.sh #72823
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\ValueNumbering\\TypeTestFolding\\TypeTestFolding.cmd #72822

Closed

  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\ArrayMD1_do\\ArrayMD1_do.cmd #72069
    7.0.0
  • Update vmImage to macOS 11.0 when capacity is available #52224
    7.0.0
  • SingleFile asp.net apps throw an exception #54759
    7.0.0
  • NonBacktracking engine is not producing the same match as other engines for multiline cases with empty matches #72470
    7.0.0
  • Test failed: System.IO.Tests.EncryptDecrypt.EncryptDecrypt_Read #12339
    7.0.0
  • Trim out more System.Threading classes in Blazor sample #44528
    7.0.0
  • Under what conditions can `TypeBuilder.CreateType()` return null #68840
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add sanity checks to build "public" properties for aot builds #52469
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Generate invoke signatures as part of the icall scanning. #54404
    7.0.0
  • Change SocketsHttpHandler's default ConnectTimeout to a reasonable finite value #66297
    7.0.0
  • Test failed: GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd #68376
    7.0.0
  • IOptionsSnapshot can return empty value #37860
    Future
  • [Android] Provide the option to use NTLM Authentication #62264
    7.0.0
  • system.globalization.tests.idnmappingidnaconformancetests.getascii_invalid #72749
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails with partial methods with implicit ILogger definition when using partial classes #61547
    7.0.0
  • dotnet global tools install problem in Amazon Linux Arm64 #72636
  • [macOS/Linux] EXC_BAD_ACCESS when inspecting lazy-loaded objects #12739
    7.0.0
  • Test failures: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory flakiness #33993
    Future
  • Importer's spilling logic is incomplete in subtle ways #72133
    8.0.0
  • Reduce CoreCLR build times in the official build #44848
    7.0.0
  • Building the Cross-Targeting Tools fails on FreeBSD-amd64 host for ARM64 target #71713
    Future
  • system.composition.typedparts.tests work item #72378
  • Unable to pull image mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet-buildtools/prereqs:fedora-34-helix #72329
  • Test failure: Build failed during "Copy native test components to test output folder" in /Users/runner/work/1/s/dotnet.sh #69588
  • CoreCLR tests fail to execute if .NET 7 Preview 4 is installed on the machine #71099
    7.0.0
  • Could not write lines to file Microsoft.NET.HostModel.ComHost.Tests #70969
  • Potential performance regression in ConcurrentDictionary #59101
    6.0.x
  • Process.ProcessName throws for services.exe when accessed from a non-admin user #70007
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.SetListenerTimeoutWorksWithSmallTimeout #72238
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The `browser-wasm` runtime pack should pack both single- and multi-threaded builds. #68508
    7.0.0
  • Use of JsonSerializerContext Can Cause CS1591 #61379
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] place multi-threaded wasm build into separate artifacts folders #68506
    7.0.0
  • MarshallingAttributeAnalyzers throws InvalidOperationException #72622
    7.0.0
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose timed out #56580
    7.0.0
  • Bizarre behavior of string.StartsWith #72770
    Future
  • Unix Domain Sockets: deleting file at sockPath is allowed while socket is listening for connections #72774
  • `Match.NextMatch` returns incorrect `Index` values for `Regex.Match(string, int, int)` #72704
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceInternal.Listeners.get timed out #55696
    Future
  • system.globalization.tests.idnmappingidnaconformancetests.getascii_invalid #72839
  • System.Diagnostics (Observability) work planned for .NET 7 #62027
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm] cannot load assets by mono_download_assets at out of AppBundle #69259
    7.0.0
  • HTTP3: Http3Stream is not removed from _activeRequests table until response Stream Dispose is called #58072
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Read can be highly inefficient #56891
    Future
  • Blazor WebAssembly error with new build: Can't find bindings module assembly: System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #72803
    5.0.x
  • System.Data.Common.Tests tests failing on iOS and tvOS #36879
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] benchmark sample crash #66614
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix new compiler warnings in the native code #69142
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Test timeout: Public_Interop_ExactVersion_BufferContent_Success #57498
    7.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests Crash #49191
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: [error] The job running on agent NetCore1ESPool-Public 31 ran longer than the maximum time of 270 minutes #72531
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Small-typed LCL_VAR nodes in modulo transform lead to bad codegen #72763
    7.0.0
  • Random System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in HttpListener #72748
  • In-proc event listener listening to native runtime event source events crashes on Mono Linux #66854
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Failure in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.MemorySendReceiveTest.ZeroByteReceive_CompletesWhenDataAvailable #64948
    8.0.0
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] libSystem.IO.Compression.Native.so contains an unresolvable reference to symbol log2: it's probably a plugin #68212
    7.0.0
  • failing test: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CapacityTests.AddingReplacementExceedsCapacityRemovesOldEntry #45868
    7.0.0
  • ObservableGauge holds disappeared metrics #72099
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.PassingVariableTagsParametersTest #67077
    7.0.0
  • Investigate what metrics need to be added to the runtime #63649
    7.0.0
  • Composite R2R binaries do not have a copyright in the PE #72701
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add BuildCrlDistributionPointExtension #72898
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • [mini] Emit a null check using MONO_EMIT_NEW_CHECK_THIS for GetArrayDataReference #72897
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not embed result type in VN for scalar hw intrinsics #72895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ref counting to the dotnet-counters providers #72894
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix the NJulianRuleTest when running with libc check builds #72893
    7.0.0
  • Add a test that ensures we are using SubtleCrypto in WASM crypto tests #72892
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add stateful marshaller support to the CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer #72888
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make revocation tests use CRLBuilder instead of its own copy #72886
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add [Shared] to two CodeFixProviders #72885
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1905340 #72884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Redisable GetAndSet_AreThreadSafe_AndUpdatesNeverLeavesNullValues test #72882
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Exclude JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/TypeTestFolding from crossgen2 testing #72878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: fix OSR for methods with modifiable `this` #72877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add extra Module.ModuleHandle test #72875
  • Update the CustomMarshallerAttributeFixer to support adding missing methods for stateless marshaller shapes #72869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update windows.10.amd64.server20h2 to windows.amd64.server2022 #72868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Remove support for CommonJS #72865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [docs] begin documenting how to use EventPipe-based profiled AOT for Mono #72864
    documentation, area-Tracing-mono
  • [Android] Change active issue number #72863
    area-System.Text.Json, os-android
  • [wasm-ep] diagnostic server IPC fixups #72859
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • fixed mono_arch_init when use INTERP_ONLY execute mode #72855
    community-contribution
  • Disable ReadAsync_CancelPendingValueTask_ThrowsCancellationException for Http1 #72854
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [iOS] Fix ZipPackage_CreateWithFileAccessWrite test #72850
    area-System.IO
  • [iOS] Skip test suites that take too long to build on helix #72849
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Better support for person (authors) names #72846
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, community-contribution
  • [wasm] enable more tests for web sockets #72843
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #72842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing mixed aot #72835
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Check on tests we disabled on Linux #72832
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Simplify UpgradeToRegexGenerator #72538
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add missing case in PruneLowerPriorityThanNullability #72871
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Add `runtime-wasm-perf` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add pod names into the area-owners.json file to support querying by pod #72564
    area-Meta
  • Fix EncryptDecrypt test #72874
    area-System.IO
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix MemoryCache test failures due to race #72821
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fix Idna Test #72817
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Change RegexGenerator to produce limited implementation for C# < 11 #72860
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Enabling some tests back onto the Interpreted engine #72639
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V2 #72744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable the ConvertToLibraryImport diagnostic by default #72819
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • System.Text.Json - Emit XML comments for public source-generated APIs #72761
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing shifting of Match._textxx fields #72728
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add CertificateRevocationListBuilder #72708
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Clarify the purpose of the official discord #72861
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72530
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm] optimize WebSocket perf for small buffers #72800
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove Http3RequestStream from _activeRequest when response is read/aborted. #72670
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix running HTTP stress tests on local docker #72844
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [iOS] Enable System.Data.Common tests #72554
  • Emit warning instead of an error in package compatibility check #72518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, packaging, 7.0.0
  • Removing the PublishAot check from the SDK #72820
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix creating small-typed LCL_VAR nodes in fgMakeTemp #72771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HttpListenerRequestUriBuilder.GetPath's search for `?` #72794
    area-System.Net
  • Bail ThreadAbort redirection after catch handlers on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Represent field RVA data with a dedicated node #72826
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Remove npm audit call in CI #72813
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Annotate System.Linq.Queryable with RDC #72899
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Modify workload to pick threading runtime packs #72412
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid a couple theoretical reorderings in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #72657
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Fix undisposed RegistryKeys in Microsoft.Win32.Registry tests #72117
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add missing System.Net docs #72459
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • CMake support in VS open folder for coreclr #70285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][wbt] Test that `dotnet.js` could be run from any current directory #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Do not reference `System.Text.Encoding.Extensions` on frameworks where it is inbox. #72784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix Enumerable.Chunk throughput regression #72811
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [GeneratedRegex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #72807
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Add SqlTypes apis for SqlClient #72724
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix a couple of issues when using textual PGO input #72773
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow trimming away `ScopedRefAttribute`. #72814
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72809
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics, 6.0.x
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactor root-level serialization logic and polymorphic value handling. #72789
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute usage in System.Net.NetworkInformation.cs #72792
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • port BitArray.CopyTo to xplat hardware intrinsics #72788
    area-System.Collections
  • Add EH filters for generic catch(T) blocks #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Stress crash WIP #72769
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [release/6.0] Support zero-byte reads on raw response streams in SocketsHttpHandler #72804
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Annoating Net.Quic & Net.Security libraries to be AOT safe #72791
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • fixes #71185 #71926
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Move inline switch table check to fginline.cpp #1944

Updated

  • Patched Fields Branch #1938

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ambiguous dotnet tool --global error message #26813
  • [6.0.400] Testing `dotnet restore` with system certificates #26810
  • Crash in `dotnet restore` for missing argument value #26809
  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #26803
  • Baseline package validator doesn't report renamed arguments #26797

Closed

  • Unable to install workloads that do not have their folder name listed in IncludedWorkloadManifests.txt #26787

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] Get PublishRelease working in .csproj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26796
  • Don't Merge: Investigate long running dotnet new integration tests on OSX with source of SDK test framework #26792
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't reference SCI and SRM 5.0.0 during source-build #26289
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set
  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lambda parameters are not checked for a number of error conditions #62960
  • Prefer interpretation of `scoped` as keyword whenever possible #62950
  • syncing namespaces often isn't worthwhile because the simplifier runs #62948
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' should preserve staticness of Program class #62943
  • EditorConfig UI 'place open brace *' options are not working #62942
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref structs #62940
  • `ForEachExplicitCastInSource` is missing from EditorConfig UI #62937
  • OperatorPlacementWhenWrapping should be moved to formatting options #62936
  • editorconfig has no highlighting #62935
  • Report error for type named `scoped` with language version 11 or later #62931
    17.4

Closed

  • Remove `ref scoped` #62338
    17.4
  • Remove tracking of unmatched `in` parameters in `GetInvocationEscapeScope()` and `CheckInvocationEscape()` #62834
  • AbstractRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62638
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs in VS build 32725.281 #62934
  • [Automated] PRs in VS build #62933
  • Enable updated escape rules if `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields` exists #62131
    17.4
  • Automated test issue #62930

PullRequests

Created

  • Move option code over to using snapshots #62959
    Area-IDE
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json for 17.4 P1 snap #62957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove FailFast when rename tracking state is messed up #62955
    Area-IDE
  • Expose an internal export provider in the new solution snapshot helper #62954
    Area-IDE
  • Move "generic attributes" feature into C# 11 #62952
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete checks for IsInCommandLineMode #62951
    Area-IDE
  • Move code off of HostLanguageServices in favor of HostProjectServices. #62949
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Bulk Delete on result of First family in projection #28525
  • Exception when translating GroupBy-FirstOrDefault-Contains on entity #28524
  • SQLite: Support ORDER BY and LIMIT in bulk update/delete #28522
  • Bulk Delete when table sharing #28521
  • Support for Bulk Update/Delete which spans multiple tables #28520
  • @asante07 that error means you actually connect to the database Server. Suggest you create a issue with proper information about your environment. #28517
  • ConnectionCreating in DbConnectionInterceptor is not overridable #28516
  • Configuring HaveConversion convention causes OwnsMany to throw NullRef #28515
  • Only first constant value of projected type is included in generated query #28514
  • DropForeignKey on down migration incorrect schema #28513
  • Unexpected behavior when setting multiple navigations #28512

Closed

  • Custom DB Functions for op_Equality are Ignored #28464

PullRequests

Created

  • Close the DbConnection when returning a context with a DbConnection to the pool #28519

Merged

  • Allow index IsDescending to get empty array for all-descending #28489
  • Some docs/exception messages for bulk delete #28523
    auto-merge
  • Sugar for sequence-based key value generation on SQL Server #28477
    providers-beware
  • API review bundle #28504

Updated

  • Implement BulkDelete #28492
  • Add a static flag in EF that will be set when code is being executed for design-time discovery #28508
